function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing air changes per hour, and implementing effective filtration measures to reduce the spread of aerosols.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in research and development, streamline regulatory processes, promote collaboration and data sharing among researchers","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving qpcr methods in terms of comparability and sensitivity when applied to wastewater.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging scientists to consider and develop other complementary methods for detecting covid-19 in wastewaters.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standardize and optimize concentration and detection methods to improve sensitivity and accuracy. implement quality control measures to ensure reliable results.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Develop and validate methodological protocols for the quantitative analysis of the virus in wbe. optimize the entire protocol including sampling, sample storage, concentration, rna extraction, and detection/quantification.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Focus on developing and validating effective methodological protocols specifically for virus quantitative analysis in complex wastewater and sludge matrices.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement stringent quality control measures, regular testing of devices, and adherence to regulatory standards for device manufacturing.","category":"Control of airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establish standardized validation protocols and regulatory oversight for biosensor technologies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of more sensitive biosensor devices with lower lods and development of effective clean-up methods for wastewater samples.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of a paper-based biosensor for sars-cov-2 detection in wastewaters and validation of its reliability for wastewater analysis.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of extensive clean-up methods to remove matrix interferences prior to biosensor detection and validation of the effectiveness of the clean-up process.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploration of alternative biomarkers and biomolecules, validation of new detection methods","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation and standardization of rt-qpcr methods, collaboration for verification","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of standardized methods for determining viral load in feces and comparison with clinical data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Further development and adaptation of technology for wastewater measurements, specifically for virus detection","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collaboration and partnerships between water authorities, technology developers, and government agencies to support the development and production of environmental biosensors","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Research and development to optimize wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control, analogies with previous outbreaks sars, mers for insights","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combine pcr technologies and endogenous biomarker measurements with other more specific diagnostic methods to confirm disease management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Address socio-economic structural conditions for sustainable transformations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct pilot studies to assess scalability, develop flexible implementation frameworks, integrate community feedback into scalability planning, and establish clear criteria for successful scale-up","category":"Maintainance / decontamination of building water systems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investing in collecting detailed local and national level entomological, incidence, and
